title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
description:
Company: IronClad Consulting Services
Location: Remote
Type: Contract or Full-Time

About IronClad Consulting Services

At IronClad Consulting Services, we partner with early-stage and high-growth companies that need expert financial leadership without committing to a full-time team. We offer tailored fractional finance solutions—whether you need CFO, controller or accounting support—to help you build consistent, scalable financial practices, leverage data for sound decisions and stay ready for fundraising or audits.

Our specialty lies in startups and growth-oriented businesses, especially in the CPG (consumer packaged goods) sector. We combine strategic planning, process improvement and technology integration to drive financial clarity and operational efficiency.

Led by seasoned professionals with deep experience in finance, accounting and operations, we become a trusted extension of your team. We focus on delivering measurable results while giving you the flexibility and expertise to grow smarter and stronger.

The Role

IronClad is looking for a Jr Full-Stack Developer to help us build secure, scalable software from the ground up. You’ll be working across the entire stack—translating Figma designs into responsive interfaces and developing robust back-end systems that meet SOC 2 compliance standards.

We’re a small, collaborative team focused on quality, speed, and clean architecture. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a hands-on environment and enjoys solving complex problems through smart design and solid engineering.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain full-stack applications using React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript frameworks
     
  • Implement database structures with PostgreSQL, SQLite, and managed services like AWS DynamoDB or Cloudflare D1
     
  • Create and maintain CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions, Vercel, and other deployment platforms
     
  • Collaborate closely with designers to bring Figma prototypes to production-ready UI
     
  • Ensure systems follow security best practices and meet SOC 2 compliance standards
     
  • Contribute to system architecture, code reviews, and API development

     

Requirements

  • Proficiency in React, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript
     
  • Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
     
  • Familiarity with AWS, Cloudflare, or similar hosting environments
     
  • Understanding of authentication, authorization, and secure API design
     
  • Comfortable working with GitHub-based workflows and CI/CD pipelines
     
  • Figma experience is highly recommended

     

Nice to Have

  • Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools

     
  • Familiarity with SOC 2 or related compliance frameworks

     
  • Previous experience contributing to small, agile teams

     
  • Experience with business processes and accounting

     

Additional Info

We’re also open to onboarding front-end developers who can grow into a full-stack role. Strong design translation and collaboration skills will be key.
